So I decided to redo, this review as my old one was 'Yes, Killing floor is the best' i thought that didnt give enough reasoning for people to buy the game but that was back in 2014 and nows 2017so let me review this product from the top of my mind as i havent played it for awhile, well this game provided some fun for 14 hours, now i would say its pretty glitchly and does have alot of bugs, i would recommend mods and also playing with friends as it gets very boring alone, i quit this game after Killing Floor 2 came out and this game stopped reciving updates, if you go to get any Killing Floor game get Killer floor 2 but if you already have that then, i do recommend buying this game, just for the kind of V1 style and feel the og killing floor.

Hopes this help some of you out

There are likely zillions of reviews for this game.. and frankly there's no reason to really make another for it.

Why am I reviewing it? To show support of course! This game is amazing and it goes on sale so often, you have to wonder why it doesn't just come standard with a steam install! YEARS later and it's still getting fresh content and is still fun to play. Honestly this game is one of the top ones out there and I can't WAIT for its sequal (Here's hoping it's a real thrill as well!)

My only gripes are the DLC for the game, it's mostly cosmetic but there are some DLC weapons that are... well... frankly pay to win levels of useful and some of those achievements (I'm looking at you, 24 headshot kills with the EBR in a row) are virtually impossible. But isn't this the point? Achieve something that you can be proud of? Hell, I just like to run around with the flame thrower and burn them!

I would highly recommend this game with some buddies- you can't go wrong with some good old fashioned mutant zombie slaying!
AWESOMEE GAME
Fun, gore, multiplayer... Worth buying especially if on sale!
Kinda like Left 4 Dead 2, but with classes and the ability to have fun.

What's this? A co-op 6 player survival horror game? Ha, I'm a one man team over here. Anyways get ready to slay a ton of undead and deadly creatures as try to survive this weird but very addicting apocalypse. The game itself reminided me of black ops zombies when your trying to survive from the undead as they try to kill you and eat your flesh. The rounds in Killing Floor are pretty intense, zombies tin to spawn out of nowhere making it hard for you to aim your gun at a target. And of course depending on with mode your on only makes it more difficult then before. Here a pro tip: Don't stand in one place, nowhere is safe just keep moving. This is where one of my favorite quotes, "The Struggle Is Real" comes in. After each round the traders shop opens up and you can stock up on ammo or buy a new heavy gun, But there is a limit to the amount of guns you can have. Killing Floor is a game that is very awesome and very brutal, it shouldn't be lefted out. This is a great zombie game, I can't wait for the second game to come on steam. Anyways lock and load or be overwhelmed by the apocalypse.

A fantastic horror, co-op, zombie killing England simulator.

You play as a bunch of ninnies who've obviously found that quite besides their tea running out, horrible mutant creatures have run amok! It's up to you (and your dosh-wielding buckos) to quell this bloody mess and try to resist the temptations of the trader whilst packing more heat than a hot cuppa. Did I mention the dosh? There's plenty of it if you survive each wave to get a bigger gun. Or a crossbow. Or an axe. No tea though. Or crumpets. A shame. Lodsamoney though.

Эта игра словно из начала двухтысячных, она выглядит плохо, музыкальный ряд примитивен, физики нет, стилистика размана толстым слоем DLC. Как будто и не было никогда таких игр как Left4Dead и Painkiller. И эта игра топчится между столпами и так и не смогла определиться со своей сотвенной стилистикой за долгие годы своего бесславного существования. Трэш без угара.

Os acordais del modo zombies del cod? Os acordais la de tiempo que pasasteis echandole horas y horas para llegar a la oleada 20? (ya que era lo mejor del juego en si, pero no nos vayamos por las ramas este es un analisis del kf joder XD)
Pues en este juego no pasareis de la 3a es muy difícil hasta en normal. Mucha variedad de enemigos, varios privilegios donde elegir y subir de nivel, dlc para el que lo quiera y mucha diversión asegurada reventando cabezas, sacando tripas y prendiendole fuego e esos pequeños hijos de putifar que quieren violarte el alma, ademas de que la tematica cambia y es un juego que es continuamente actualizado muy recomendable aunque como ya sabemos que va a salir el 2 y de como va esto (lo empezaran a subir youtubers y se creara un hype tremendo) le pasará lo que a left 4 dead, la 2a parte sera lo mismo con mejores gráficos.

Jubilatoire à souhait, Killing Floor offre une expérience de jeu gore à foison, pour tout amateur d'FPS bien défoulant. Un concept  de gameplay simple mais vite accrocheur. Similaire à un certain  Left For Dead ou encore Painkiller, la coopération entre joueurs est ici au coeur du jeu!  Peut vite devenir hardcore selon le mode de difficulté et offre un bon challenge pour les plus vétérans!  Je le recommande sans hésiter.

Дилемма: покупка игры, которую абсолютно легально можно скачать, и пиратством это не назовут. В ней, правда, модели персонажей и спецэффекты другие, нет виртуальных «достижений», но в остальном очень похоже.

 На каждой из шести карт, идущих в комплекте, нужно сдерживать волны зомби-подопытных, и не давать им скушать героя. Поскольку дело происходит в Великобритании, то между волнами – обязательный перерыв на чай. В это время работает отличный буфет, только вместо сладеньких булочек – оружие. Покупается оно на фунты, сыплющиеся из убитых монстров. Как только перерыв заканчивается, наш герой, закусив напоследок прихваченной печенюшкой, разбирается с новой волной, и так до встречи с огромным боссом.

 Ай, да ребята, сразу видно, что им не очень нравятся официальные пресс-релизы с упоминаниями о сногсшибательном звуке Dolby Digital, интуитивном управлении и next-gen графике. Хотя звук действительно не Dolby Digital, а у графики… Но не будем забегать вперед.
